[Incredible Luck](/Feats.aspx?ID=6178) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fortune" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=612" />
<trait label="Swashbuckler" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=825" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 169 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Charmed Life](/Feats.aspx?ID=6138)

</column>

---

You always seem to bounce back from the worst. When you use Charmed Life, roll the save twice (including the +2 circumstance bonus from Charmed Life) and use the better result.
name: Incredible Luck
